description:
Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.

# Accurate Forecasts
Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.

# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.

# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.

# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.

# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.

# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.

# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.


***

Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).

Privacy Policy: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/terms-and-conditions
EULA: https://www.apptico.fr/weather/eula

Accurate, actionable air quality in real time. Know your local AQI and PM2.5 with clear steps to plan your day and reduce exposure.

What you get:
  - Live map with AQI and PM2.5 for places you care about
  - Alerts when air quality changes at your saved locations
  - Global coverage in nearly all countries
  - Simple, science-based guidance on what to do next
  - Home and Lock Screen widgets for glanceable AQI
  - Offline-aware status for uninterrupted awareness
  - Tips and guidance in the in-app Blog
  - Localized experience in English, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Khmer, Lao, Spanish, Thai, and Vietnamese

Make better decisions every day:
  - Reduce exposure during smoke or smog events
  - Time workouts and outdoor plans with confidence
  - Protect kids, elders, and sensitive groups
  - Travel confidently with saved places and alerts

Data you can trust:
  - Shows air quality from trusted reference stations and AirGradient monitors worldwide
  - Built on established air quality standards with transparent, science-informed methods

Built by AirGradient:
  - Created by AirGradient, a social-impact business with a strong scientific background
  - The team behind open-source air quality monitors used by schools, researchers, and communities
  globally
  - Our mission: raise awareness of the dangers of air pollution and empower action
  - We work with small grassroots organizations and major international organizations like UNICEF and
  UNDP, and with leading universities such as the University of Cambridge

Community and impact:
  - Featuring communities from around the world, fighting air pollution together
  - Read real stories, learn what works, and take action locally
  - Join a global movement to improve the air we all share

Design and performance:
  - Optimized for iOS 26 with a liquid glass UI
  - Smooth interactions, refined haptics, and fast updates
  - Thoughtful accessibility support for larger text and VoiceOver

Privacy and control:
  - Location is optional - search and save places manually if you prefer
  - Clear settings and easy controls to manage alerts and data

Quick definitions:
  - AQI: Air Quality Index, a simple scale for overall air quality
  - PM2.5: Fine particles (≤2.5µm) that can affect heart and lung health

Get the air quality that matters to you - accurate, timely, and easy to act on.

Disclaimer: This app provides informational guidance only and is not a medical device or medical advice.

developer: Hefeng Internet Technology Beijing Co Ltd
description:
* Visualized Weather App!

* Visual Weather
Feel the global weather condition trends on QWeather's beautiful weather map.  Currently supported map layers include: temperature, pressure, humidity, cloud cover, aurora probability, wave height, sea surface temperature, CAPE, snow depth, dew point temperature, radar reflection, and many more, with more being added all the time.

* Time Machine
What was the temperature today last week? How many times did it rain last year? How many days are there heavy air pollution? Time machine takes you through weather data from the past.

* Smart Reminders
"Remind me if it rains in Beijing", a weather forecast set up exactly according to your setting, let you know for different weather in different cities, reducing useless notification.

* Global data
QWeather supports weather data query for millions of cities around the world. Even if you are drifting in the ocean one day, you can pull out your phone to check the sea surface temperature and wave flow direction :P

* Various kinds of weather
Real-time weather, up to 30-day forecasts and hour-by-hour forecasts, minute precipitation, weather warnings, real-time air quality and forecasts, historical weather, typhoons, tides, sunrise and sunset, moonrise and moonset, moon phases, etc... 

* All Platform
Supports iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, macOS (sold separately)

-----------------------

# You are a developer? Visit our develop website at https://dev.qweather.com/en/ 

-----------------------

# QWeather Pro Subscription Service

QWeather Pro Subscription unlocks all features, access to more beautiful weather layers, fun app icons, and no ads. Subscriptions include:
* QWeather Pro (yearly): $7.49/year
* QWeather Pro (monthly): $0.99/month


Please note:
1. Auto-renewal: When you subscribe to the QWeather Pro, your subscription will be automatically renewed and extended before each subscription expires.
2. Cancel at any time: You can cancel your subscription at any time by opening "App Store > Avatar > Subscriptions" and selecting "Cancel QWeather Pro subscription". If you cancel within 24 hours before the subscription expires, the App store will still bill you for the next subscription period.
3. Change the subscription term: You can choose to move from a monthly subscription to an annual subscription to enjoy more discounted offers. When you do so, you will pay for the new subscription period after the current subscription expires.

-----------------------

# Terms of Service and Privacy

We take your rights and privacy very seriously, please read the following terms carefully before you start using.

Privacy Policy: https://staticpages.qweather.com/en/legal/privacy.html
Terms of Service: https://staticpages.qweather.com/en/legal/app-tos.html

-----------------------

# Your feedback and suggestions are valuable information for us, any questions and ideas, feel free to contact us at: support@qweather.com

Meet Weather. The most beautiful weather app. Ever. Now available on the App Store.

Don't let bad weather take you by surprise! Whether it is cloudy, raining, snowing or even stormy outside, Weather will provide you with current weather conditions and forecast in your city and multiple locations all around the world.

Cold or warm weather, it will magically come alive on the crisp screen of your iOS device. You won’t even have to look out the window as Weather will make you feel like you are already outside!

This app contains subscription :
- You can subscribe for premium account with detailed forecasts, premium maps and no ads
- Subscription is from $12.99 USD monthly
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original "one month" package unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Links to our ToS and Privacy Policy
https://www.iubenda.com/terms-and-conditions/44220384

To see the EULA, please visit:

The most trusted and reliable air quality information from the world’s leading air pollution data provider. Covering 500,000+ locations from a global network of government monitoring stations and IQAir's own validated sensors. 

Recommended for sensitive people (allergies, asthma, etc), a must-have for families and great for athletes, runners, cyclists and outdoor sports activities. Plan the healthiest day with health recommendations, 48-hour forecasts, and check the real-time global air quality map. Learn what pollutants you are breathing, their sources and effects and stay informed about key air quality and wildfire breakouts in your area.

+ Historical, Real-time, and Forecast Air Pollution Data: Detailed figures on key pollutants and AQI for over 500,000+ locations in 100+ countries, made clearly understandable. Follow air pollution trends with enhanced month-long and 48h historical views for your favorite locations. 

+ Leading 7-Day Air Pollution and Weather Forecast: For the first time, plan your outdoor activities for the healthiest experiences a whole week ahead. Wind direction and speed forecasts to understand the wind’s impact on pollution. 

+ 2D & 3D World Pollution Maps: Explore real-time pollution indexes around the globe, both in a 2D panoramic view, and mesmerizing heatmapped AirVisual Earth 3D modelization. 

+ Health Recommendations: Follow our advice to lower your health risk and achieve minimum exposure to pollutants. Relevant information for sensitive groups with asthma or other respiratory (pulmonary) diseases. 

+ Weather Information: Your one-stop for temperature, humidity, wind, current conditions and forecast weather information. 

+ Wildfire and air quality events: Stay informed on wildfires, smoke, and air quality events worldwide. See alerts and track events on an interactive map with real-time & historical data, forecasts, news updates, and more. 

+ Pollen counts: View tree, weed & grass pollen counts for your favorite places and protect yourself from allergies. Plan your outdoor activities with 3-day forecasts (available in some regions only)

+ Realtime and Historic Monitoring of 6 Key Pollutants: Track live concentrations of PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, sulphur dioxide and carbon monoxide, and observe pollutants historical trends. 

+ Real-time air pollution city ranking: Track the best and worst cities by air quality and pollution for 100+ locations worldwide, based on live PM2.5 concentrations.

+ “Sensitive Group” Air Quality Information: Relevant information and forecasts for sensitive groups, including respiratory (pulmonary) illnesses, such as asthma.

+ Extended Historical Data Graphs: View air pollution trends over the past 48 hours, or daily averages over the past month. 

+ Control your air purifier: Remotely control & monitor your Atem X & HealthPro series air purifiers for safer indoor air quality with live & historical data, comparisons, filter replacement alerts, scheduled on/off and more.

+ Indoor & Outdoor Air Quality Monitoring: Synchronization with IQAir AirVisual Pro and AirVisual Outdoor air monitors to provide readings, recommendations, and control monitor settings.

+ Air Pollution Community News: Stay up to date on air pollution current events, medical findings, and developments in combating global air pollution. 

+ Educational Resources: Build your understanding of PM2.5 and other air pollutants and learn how best to live in polluted environments with respiratory (pulmonary) illnesses such as asthma. 

+ Worldwide coverage with the most extensive network of air pollution sensors: monitor China, India, Singapore, Japan, Korea, USA, Canada, Australia, Mexico, Brazil, France, Hong Kong, Thailand, Indonesia, Chile, Turkey, Germany + more - as well as cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Seoul, Mumbai, New Delhi, Tokyo, Mexico City, Bangkok, London, Los Angeles, New York, San Francisco, Paris, Berlin, Ho Chi Minh City, Chiang Mai + more - in one place!

A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION
While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts. 

WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY
A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.

MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS

- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast 
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture

Available global weather models and resolution: 
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA 
- ICON by DWD 

Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA 
- HRDPS by MSC 
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM


CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.

HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING
With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.

WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS
Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.

TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast 
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner 

WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime. 

Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy

GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.

FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast

The award winning tide app for Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad and Mac. Never miss a tide, sunset, or beautiful day on the water. Tide Guide features tide and marine weather conditions from trusted data providers worldwide. It's beautiful, powerful, and provides easy access to thousands of different tide stations around the world.

# Apple Design Award & App Store App of the Year Finalist


# Built for Apple Watch
Gorgeous full screen charts provide detailed tide and weather conditions. Each chart is dynamic and can switch between other conditions and views with just a tap.


# Monthly & Yearly Tide Tables
View detailed forecasts for 10 days, and tide tables for the next 12 months. Various display options allow for powerful layout customizations.


# Home and Lock Screen Widgets
Add beautiful and powerful widgets to your Home Screen or Lock Screen. Tide Guide features an extensive set of widgets, with powerful customization options allow for endless combinations of marine and tide conditions.


# Live Activities
Use Live Activities to follow the current tide or sunset. There are different options for various “island activities.” Track the current tide, wind direction, solar progress, or lunar phase.


# Summary Shortcuts
Use Siri or the Shortcuts app to view different summaries of the tide, surf conditions, upcoming forecasts, and more. Ask Siri “Tide Guide Surf Report” to never miss the next swell.


# Lunar Calendar
Easily track the current lunar phase with a beautiful lunar phase calendar. Explore the altitude and elevation of the moon throughout the day, and view detailed solunar times like nautical dawn, dusk, and more.


# Pro Features
Many features in the app are free to use, and certain availability varies by region.
Widgets, complications, detailed charts, and future table data require an active Pro subscription.



Privacy & Terms:
https://tideguide.com/privacy
https://tideguide.com/terms

Weather⁺ is more than just the weather! Experience the weather forecast with beautiful video backgrounds that change along the local weather conditions of your location.

FREE IN WEATHER⁺
• Forecast Daily & 3-Hourly
• Humidity, Precipitation, Pressure, Wind direction & speed
• Visibility details
• Weather Widgets - Weekly Weather (iPhone & iPad)
• Changing Video Background along with weather conditions
• Personalize your Forecast Layout screen
• Animated Flip Clock
• Split View for multitasking support
• Full Apple Watch support

SUBSCRIPTION TO PREMIUM ACCESS
•  a 100% Ad Free experience
•  Full access to all Weather Videos  
•  Premium Customer Support

Subscriptions automatically renew each month 24 hours before the end of the current period and your iTunes account will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from within the app. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. Terms & Conditions: https://impalastudios.com/terms Privacy Policy: https://impalastudios.com/privacy


CHANGE THE TIME
In the settings, you can switch between ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time.’ To switch between them, click the ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time’ options on the clock's hour section.

ADD LOCATION ON APPLE WATCH
It’s handy to know that the first location added to your list is set as the location on your Apple Watch. To edit or change this, you can reorder the cities in your location overview on your iPhone.

CHANGE MY BACKGROUND VIDEO
Unfortunately, you can’t manually select a video to play as a background. The app selects a random video from a pool of weather videos that match the weather for the report you’re currently viewing.
You can expand this pool of videos by unlocking videos in the menu screen, which is done by watching a short ad per video.


YOUR EXPERIENCE IS IMPORTANT TO US!
Please check if the answers are available in the Frequently Asked Questions app Settings.
We’re pleased with your feedback, questions, and suggestions.
Our support team is always ready to help via support@impalastudios.com.

LOVING WEATHER⁺?
Please show your support by rating us! Thank you.

My Earthquake Alerts is a powerful earthquake monitoring app which delivers all of the information you need, with push notifications included, all free of charge. It also includes a beautifully simple design optimized for the latest iPhone and iPad.

FEATURES
- Live earthquake map which can detect and track earthquakes from all around the world.
- Free earthquake alerts customized for you, with no restrictions.
- Powerful search feature to find earthquake history dating back to 1970!
- Beautiful & simple design - view the earthquake feed on a map and in a list.
- Find the exact location, the depth and the distance away from you.
- Uses information from a wide variety of earthquake networks, including the USGS and EMSC.
- Support for the latest iPhone and iPad models.

If you need information or notifications about the latest earthquakes near to you, download My Earthquake Alerts today. This version is ad-supported. It is similar to apps such as Quakes, MyQuake and QuakeFeed.

Dusty – The Air Around You is Always Good

Monitor real-time air quality, fine dust, and a wide range of pollutants all in one place with Dusty.
Access accurate and reliable data anytime, anywhere to stay informed and protect your health.

• Real-time Air Quality Monitoring
Dusty provides trusted air quality data based on the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (US AQI) standard.
Check the air quality at your current location in real time, or save your favorite places for quick access whenever you need.
Keep track of the air in your home, workplace, or travel destinations with just a glance.

• Detailed Pollutant Tracking
More than just fine dust (PM2.5, PM10), Dusty delivers comprehensive pollutant information.
Monitor ozone (O₃), nitrogen dioxide (NO₂), sulfur dioxide (SO₂), and carbon monoxide (CO) for a complete view of air conditions.
Plan your day with confidence—whether you’re heading outdoors with your kids, commuting, or exercising.

• Intuitive Air Quality Animation
Numbers alone can be hard to grasp. Dusty brings air quality to life with realistic interactive animations.
See the air around you visualized in real time and understand changes at a glance.

• Forecasts & Charts
Don’t just check today’s air—see what’s coming.
With clean, intuitive line charts, Dusty helps you track air quality, fine dust concentration, and major pollutants over the next few days.
Know in advance when the air might worsen and plan your outdoor activities with ease.

• Global Air Quality Map
Dusty covers over 500,000 locations across 100 countries.
Check AQI and pollutant levels anywhere in the world, from major cities to local neighborhoods.
Stay connected by monitoring air conditions for your family or friends abroad.

• Home Screen Widget
Get the air quality at your current location instantly, without opening the app.
With quick and convenient widgets, you can check the air before commuting, working out, or heading outdoors—making healthier choices every day.

Why Dusty?
Protecting your health from fine dust and air pollution is easier with Dusty.
From real-time AQI to detailed forecasts, pollutant data, and a global air quality map, Dusty helps you stay informed and prepared.
With intuitive visualizations and interactive animations, air quality data has never been this easy to understand.

Even on days with heavy pollution, there’s no need to worry.
Start your day fresh and healthy with Dusty.

CARROT Weather is a crazy-powerful (and privacy-conscious) weather app that delivers hilariously twisted forecasts. 

** Winner of Apple's App of the Year, Apple Design Award, and App Store Editors' Choice. Featured by The New York Times, Good Morning America, CNN, Wired, & more! ** 

Overflowing With Personality
Choose one of five personalities for CARROT, from the straitlaced “professional” to the profanity-laden “overkill.” You’ll actually be looking forward to a torrential downpour just to see what your weather robot has in store for you!

Accurate & Detailed
CARROT’s super accurate weather data gives you lightning-quick access to your current, hourly, and daily forecasts. And the easy-to-read details screens are just dripping with with meteorological goodness. 

Privacy First
Your personal information, including your location data, will never be sold to third parties.

More Than A Weather App
Complete activities to strengthen your relationship with the homicidal A.I. Follow clues to track down 150+ secret locations. Unlock 80+ achievements. Film your own TV-news-style weather report videos. Or use Augmented Reality Mode to bring CARROT right into your living room.

Join Premium Club to unlock:

- More weather data sources, including Apple Weather, AccuWeather, and Tomorrow.io
- Notifications, including precipitation, weather alerts, and lightning strikes (where available)
- Lock & Home Screen widgets 
- Live Activities
- Apple Watch complications and background updates 
- Weather maps with next-hour radar, individual radar stations, and many different layers (where available)
- Customization of the entire user interface
- CarPlay app
- And so much more!

Don’t make CARROT angry. Download her now!

---

CARROT Weather uses auto-renewing subscriptions. 

Premium provides additional features like weather data sources, notifications, customization, widgets, and Apple Watch complications.

Premium Ultra includes all the features of Premium, plus rain, lightning, and storm cell notifications (where available), a CarPlay app, super-res radar, a weather maps widget, and quick data source switching.

Premium Family includes all the features of Premium Ultra, with the added benefit of being shareable with up to five family members via Apple’s Family Sharing service. 

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Weather App is a beautiful and clean app, designed to be as simple to use as possible, to make you want to open it. With just one click you can check the weather for today, tomorrow and the next 10 days.

The current weather for today and the forecast for tomorrow are gorgeously animated. See realistic rain, snow or thunderstorm animations, sun rays for clear days, the moon’s glow and the stars at night, moving clouds and more. They all reflect the weather making it come alive.

The background color changes to reflect the weather conditions making you almost feel the weather. From light blue for clear days to darker grays for cloudy days you’ll know how’s the weather like with just one glance.

The Weather App is using Weather Underground as a weather data provider, some of the most advanced weather forecasting provider available, which gives hyper-accurate data wherever you find yourself.

FEATURES

● Current weather conditions and temperatures for today. Beautiful hourly graph for the next hours today and tonight.
● How’s the weather tomorrow? Easily check the weather forecast for tomorrow, including hourly.
● Extended 10 day weather forecast outlook.
● Swipe down to view detailed conditions: humidity, dew point, UV index, visibility, chance of rain, animated wind, pressure and sunrise/sunset.
● Animated weather conditions for today and tomorrow.
● Live background color reflects weather conditions.
● Automatically detects your location and retrieves the latest weather conditions for your current location.
● Add and track weather conditions for all your favorite cities and destinations
● Celsius and Fahrenheit weather units
● The app and the weather data is available in over 40 languages.
● Share the app and invite your friends on Facebook to use the app.

app_name: 天气预报-精准15日天气预报
description:
关心天气，更关心您！
 1. App store天气、天气预报分类常年位居前二！超过10,000,000+天气用户的信赖！
 2.可精准定位至街道，预报数据详细及时准确的天气类APP！
 3. 连续多次荣获各大网站和市场的用户喜欢的免费天气、天气预报应用！

 【天气数据详细准确】
包含国内外3w+城市以及国内3w+景区的天气信息，采用国内外多家气象机构数据，天气预报信息准确全面。24小时逐时预报、未来十五天、未来四十日天气预报一应俱全，专业提供短中长期天气预报，全方位守护您的生活。空气污染指数，pm2.5，空气污染指数排名！确保您实时了解空气质量状态，合理安排出行计划！

【雷达降雨云图】
提供分钟级降雨数据，可精确预测每条街道几点几分下雨/雨停。雷达降雨云图覆盖全国超200部雷达，可查看全国任意经纬度未来120分钟的降水情况，以及大风、冰雹、雷电等强对流天气发生概率，助您准确掌握天气变化。

【听天气】
可通过语音视频知晓天气预报，包括今日天气预报及本周或下周天气变化，播报气温、降雨、空气质量等。方便您在晨间洗漱及通勤交通上“听”天气，语音清晰流畅、真实自然。

【天气日历】
行业首创“天气日历”功能，提供万年历及黄历信息，万年历支持节日查询、农历查询、节日节气查询等，不再忘记重要日子。传统老黄历支持每日宜忌、每日运势、属相相冲、吉神方位等查询，祝您趋吉避凶，好天气、好运气！

【潮汐天气】
全新“潮汐天气”上线！支持全球485个港口未来15日潮汐预报数据查询，全球潮汐测定，数据图表展示潮汐涨落情况实用便捷。为您外出赶海、海钓、旅游等提供专业潮汐预报服务。

【生活建议】
气压、湿度、能见度是您户外钓鱼的好帮手！还有空气质量、污染指数、温度趋势、pm2.5，空气质量指数等更加丰富、准确全面天气信息！提供穿衣、洗车、紫外线、流感、运动、旅游等生活指数，是您日常生活、出行旅游的不可或缺天气预报APP！

*产品特点*
 特点一：消耗流量少！使用电量少！占用内存少！
 特点二：支持一键切换大字体，方便长辈使用。
 特点三：超炫天气动画，下雨、打雷、闪电动画唯美逼真！
 特点四：支持iOS14主屏幕小组件，多种尺寸不同皮肤随心搭配。
 特色五：超多天气主题背景任您选择。
 特色六：拥有钓鱼天气预报，给您专业垂钓意见指导。

Windy.app - wind, waves and weather forecast app for surfers, kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, fishermen and other wind sports. 

FEATURES:
•  Wind report, forecast and statistics: wind map, accurate wind compass, wind meter, wind gusts and wind directions. It’s very useful for extreme wind sports.
•  Wind alert: Set up windalert and be aware of wind, storm and tornado warning via push-notifications
•  Weather history (archive) for 2012-2024: view wind data, temperature (day and night) and atmospheric pressure. Weather archive will help you to choose the best month for travel to the spot.
•  Local forecast from NOAA: temperature in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, humidity, wind speed, precipitation (rain and snow). Forecast for 10 days with 3 hours step in metric or imperial units: m/s (mps), mph, km/h, knt (knout), bft (beaufort), m, ft, mm, cm, in, hPa, inHg. NOAA is a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / National Weather Service (nws).
•  Wave forecast: ocean or sea conditions, ocean waves and sea swell, fishing forecast
•  Animated wind tracker: weather radar for sailing, yachting and kiting in light wind
•  Cloud base/Dewpoint (dew point) data: necessary weather information for pleasant paragliding 
•  Spots: over 30.000 spots sorted and located by the type and area. Add your spots to favourites.
•  Spot chats. Got anemometer? Share info about weather conditions and wind direction in the chat from a kite spot.
•  Community: exchange weather reports on the spot. Want to be a local/spot leader? Email us the name of your spot at feedback@catchwind.co and we will create a chat for it.
•  Weather Stations: online data from nearby online weather stations.
•  Offline Mode: activate offline mode and check the forecast for your activities without internet connection.

PERFECT FOR:
• Kitesurfing (kitesurf)
• Windsurfing (wind surf)
• Surfing
• Sailing (Boating)
• Yachting
• Paragliding
• Fishing
• Snowkiting 
• Snowboarding
• Skiing
• Skydiving
• Kayaking (kayak)
• Wakeboarding
• Cycling
• Hunting (hunt)
• Golf
